author: senh
title: Senators beat Maple Leafs in 1st shootout of NHL season
text: BING NEWS: Senators beat Maple Leafs in 1st shootout of NHL season Ottawa Senators' Mark Stone, left, scores against the Toronto Maple Leafs' goalkeeper James … View gallery Toronto Maple Leafs' goalkeeper James Reimer, right, makes a save on Ottawa Senators' Milan … View gallery Toronto Maple Leafs' Peter Holland ... 10/10/2015 - 7:19 pm | View Link Lupul scores in OT as Leafs beat Senators 4-3 in pre-season game Lupul scored 55 seconds in to overtime to give the Toronto Maple Leafs ... who was making his NHL debut. “It was a great experience. I’ll probably remember it for the rest of my life.” Comeback was the theme of the night for the Leafs, who trailed ... 09/21/2015 - 11:58 pm | View Link Senators no longer control playoff hopes after losing to Leafs in shootout They'll have to do a little of each after losing 3-2 in a shootout to the Toronto Maple Leafs on Sunday night at Air ... Joffrey Lupul and James van Riemsdyk scored for the Leafs (30-43-7), who beat the Senators for the sixth straight time at home ... 04/6/2015 - 5:05 am | View Link NHL scores: Leafs down Senators in shootout TORONTO (AP) - Peter Holland scored the winning goal in the seventh round of the shootout to lift Toronto past the Ottawa Senators 3-2. Joffrey Lupul and James van Riemsdyk scored in regulation for the Maple Leafs ...
